org.forgerock.openam.sts.soap.token.validator

Class SimpleTokenValidatorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.sts.soap.token.validator.SimpleTokenValidatorBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.cxf.sts.token.validator.TokenValidator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleOpenIdConnectTokenValidator, SimpleSAML2TokenValidator

    public abstract class SimpleTokenValidatorBase
extends Object
implements org.apache.cxf.sts.token.validator.TokenValidator
    Base class for the TokenValidator instances plugged into the TokenValidateOperation. These TokenValidator implementations will only consult the TokenService to determine if a token with the specified id has been generated by the sts. No authN module will be consumed - hence the 'Simple' prefix. This functionality may be enhanced if/when a SAML2 authN module is written.
